content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 200 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azsynapseanalaysisdl.blob.core.windows.net/azsynapseanalysisfile/green_tripdata_2023-01.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


CREATE DATABASE DataExplorationDB 
                COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
